dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: Cart-Pole is a standard evaluation environment in OpenAI Gym for RL models. The original version has a frictionless track with a fixed joint connecting a pole to a cart. The goal is to maintain the pendulum near its starting position by moving the cart left or right.
dcterms:title: Cart-Pole

dcterms:creator: A. Ravindran
dcterms:description: CartPoleMod is a modified version of the Cart-Pole environment that takes into account the effects of friction on the system, with various noise configurations.
dcterms:title: CartPoleMod
